descriptionHtml:
Hello peeps, this is my first NPC mod ever so, please be kind. This is Doom, the dremora Orc, lost in the hazy mead fogs of the sleeping giant inn - in Riverwood :o You can't really talk to him cos he doesn't like you that much, and u can't ask him to go with you on a knee filling arrow quest... so.. meh.

Requires:Â 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?]Glowing Eyes[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal
[/url]
author: Ixum
